name: Not Enough Room
description:
Avoid if you're claustrophobic or don't want to destroy your keyboard.
It was made for LD38 within 12 hours because I missed most of the jam due to RL stuff.

Not Enough Room is a game where you run, duck, jump and climb about a room you rather not be in.

Controls:

  • Move: AD/↔
  • Jump: Space
  • Jump Height: WS/↕
